problem.markdown:
>>What is the enemy of manufacturing？<<
( ) Inventory (x) Variability ( ) Captial Expenditure ( ) Overtime Labor ( ) Idle Time
[Explanation] Variability is one of the main drivers that cause high inventory, overtime labor and idle time. Captial expenditure can be a result of variability, but can also be a neccesity to increase capacity. [Explanation] <script src="/static/st.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the enemy of manufacturing？

div.p: Variability is one of the main drivers that cause high inventory, overtime labor and idle time. Captial expenditure can be a result of variability, but can also be a neccesity to increase capacity.
